select node.id as id, node.uuid as uuid, node.version as version, node.store_id as store_id, #{storeProtocol} as protocol, #{storeIdentifier} as identifier, qname.local_name as type_name, ns.uri as type_namespace, acl.acl_change_set as acl_changeset_id from alf_node node join alf_store store on store.id = node.store_id left outer join alf_access_control_list acl on node.acl_id = acl.id left outer join alf_qname qname on node.type_qname_id = qname.id left outer join alf_namespace ns on qname.ns_id = ns.id where
concat('{', ns.uri, '}', qname.local_name) in
#{item} and
node.id not in ( select n.id from alf_node n join alf_node_properties np on np.node_id=n.id join alf_qname qnp on qnp.id=np.qname_id and qnp.local_name='name' and
np.string_value like concat('%', #{extension})
) and
node.store_id = #{storeId} and acl.acl_change_set > #{minId} and acl.acl_change_set <= #{maxId} order by acl.acl_change_set ASC
